Title: January 2013
Content: 10 *p41215a01024* section b answer all the questions.  write your answers in the spaces provided. 14 this question concerns the chemistry of copper.  in the sequence below, a, b, c, d, e  and f all contain copper in various oxidation states.   (a) identify, by name (including the oxidation state where appropriate) or formula,  the copper-containing species in the sequence. (6) a   b   c   d   e   f   cuso4(aq) naoh a (pale blue solid) heat b (black solid) ki(aq) nh3(aq) copper(i) iodide h2so4(aq) d (pink solid) + e (blue solution) c (dark blue solution) nh3(aq) vigorous shaking f (colourless solution) pmt
